title: Daniel's Farm Adventure
story: Daniel wanted to visit a farm. He asked his parents to take him to a farm. His teacher told him about the animals on a farm. There are lots of animals on a farm. Daniel wanted to see the animals. He wanted to see the cows. He wanted to see the chickens. He wanted to see the pigs. He wanted to pet the animals. He wanted to feed the animals. He loved animals. He wanted to live on a farm. He wanted to live with cows and chickens and pigs. They would be his friends. He didn't have any friends in school.
summary: Follow Daniel on his farm adventure as he explores the world of cows, chickens, and pigs, and discovers his love for animals.
image: An illustration of Daniel standing in a farmyard, surrounded by cows, chickens, and pigs.
